plot: Angèle, a beautiful young woman with a past, arrives in a small fishing harbor in Normandy. She meets Tony, a professional fisherman, who finds himself attracted to her although he dislikes her blunt ways. Tony hires her as a fishmonger, lodges her and teaches her the tricks of the trade. The relationships between Myriam, Tony's mother, and Angèle are far from easy but the young woman gradually adapts to her new environment and little by little Tony and Angèle manage to tame each other...   Written by  Guy Bellinger
title: El amor de Tony

cast.role: Myriam Vialet - la mère de Tony
cast.name: Evelyne Didi

cast.role: Ryan Vialet - le frère de Tony
cast.name: Jérôme Huguet
